        stores object and all included. Sets a maxAge for this object and all included objects
        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        identifiers - elements may be null

      • getRelatedObjectsOrNull

        protected java.util.List<OddObject> getRelatedObjectsOrNull(OddObject oddObject)
        Get all OddObjects contained in all of the relationships of an OddObject. Recursive relationships are not resolved.
        Returns:
        if all related objects are contained in the store then they are returned as a list, otherwise null Related objects that aren't in the EntityCache will not be included in list.

      • clear

        protected void clear()
        removes all objects from store
